thread.title: Pfizer’s Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Receives FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation for Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL) (Pfizer Inc) ...
thread.title_full: Pfizer’s Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Receives FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation for Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL) (Pfizer Inc) ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Pfizer’s Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Receives FDA Breakthrough Therapy Designation for Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL) (Pfizer Inc) ...
text: ( Source : Pfizer Inc ) NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE )--Pfizer Inc. today announced that investigational antibody-drug conjugate ( ADC ) inotuzumab ozogamicin received Breakthrough Therapy designation from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration ( FDA )
